Miscellaneous Utilities¶

Miscellaneous utility functions.

conformer_rl.utils.misc_utils.current_time() → str¶

Returns a string containing the current date and time.

conformer_rl.utils.misc_utils.set_one_thread() → None¶

Sets the number of CPU threads to 1 for each Python process.

conformer_rl.utils.misc_utils.mkdir(path: str) → None¶

Creates directory specified by the input string.

conformer_rl.utils.misc_utils.to_np(t: None._VariableFunctionsClass.tensor) → numpy.array¶

Converts a PyTorch tensor to a Numpy array.

conformer_rl.utils.misc_utils.save_model(model: torch.nn.modules.module.Module, filename: str) → None¶

Saves model parameters of a PyTorch neural network to a file.

conformer_rl.utils.misc_utils.load_model(model: torch.nn.modules.module.Module, filename: str) → None¶

Loads model parameters of a PyTorch network from a file.
